TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi VirtualizingStackPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo
Public Class VirtualizingStackPanel Inherits VirtualizingPanel Implements IScrollInfo

summary.span: 排列和虛擬化單一水平或垂直行的內容。

span.span: Arranges and virtualizes content on a single line that is oriented either horizontally or vertically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準配置系統會建立項目容器，然後計算每個項目的清單控制項相關聯的配置。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. Word 「 虛擬化 」 是指一種技術的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]該項目會產生較大的數字，根據畫面上所顯示的項目項目。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 產生許多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]項目在螢幕上可能只有幾個項目時可能會影響應用程式的效能。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 計算可見的項目數目，並搭配從(例如或) 來建立[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]僅為可見的項目項目。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items. 中的虛擬化面板中所包含的項目控制項建立自己的項目容器時才會發生。Virtualization in a only occurs when the items control contained in the panel creates its own item containers. 您可以確保發生資料繫結，透過這種情況。You can ensure this happens by using data binding. 建立並加入至項目控制項中，項目容器透過提供任何效能優勢。In scenarios where item containers are created and added to the items control, a offers no performance advantage over a . 是預設項目主機項目。 is the default items host for the element. 根據預設，`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的屬性設定為`true`。By default, the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is set to `true`. 當`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的屬性設定為`false`、行為和一般一樣。When the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is set to `false`, a behaves the same as an ordinary . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將繫結至 XML 資料來源並虛擬化中所顯示的項目項目使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The following example shows how to bind to an XML data source and virtualize the items displayed in a element using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 請注意，`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的屬性明確設定為`true`。Notice that the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is explicitly set to `true`. [!code-xaml[VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro/CS/default.xaml#2)] 下列範例會建立並設定`VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode`附加屬性。The following example creates a and sets the `VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode` attached property to . [!code-xaml[RecycleItemContainerShippets#VirtualizationMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#virtualizationmode)] 下列範例使用前一個範例中的資料。The following example shows the data used in the previous example. [!code-csharp[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#listboxdata)] [!code-vb[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#listboxdata)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void LineDown() cil managed

summary.span: 將內容向下捲動一個邏輯單位。

span.span: Scrolls content downward by one logical unit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫這個方法來變更如何堆疊面板向下捲動內容的衍生類別中。You can override this method in a derived class to change how the stack panel scrolls content downward. 例如，您可以向下捲動內容的兩個單位，而不是其中一個。For example, you can scroll content down by two units instead of one. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動，包裝中並設定其屬性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在此情況下，提供已停用向下捲動，與虛擬化。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向下捲動，當不會成長得的配置大小，但有效地將子系加入 z 平面上，這通常由父項目裁剪 (通常) 至堆疊的大小。When scrolling, does not grow in layout size, but effectively adds its descendants on a z-plane, which is normally clipped by a parent element (typically a ) to the size of the stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫變更堆疊面板如何回應滑鼠滾輪下移動作的衍生類別中。You can override in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the mouse wheel down action. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動，包裝中並設定其屬性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在此情況下，提供已停用向下捲動，與虛擬化。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PageDown() cil managed

summary.span: 將內容向下捲動一頁。

span.span: Scrolls content downward by one page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫變更堆疊面板如何回應 page down 動作的衍生類別中。You can override in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the page down action. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動，包裝中並設定其屬性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在此情況下，提供已停用向下捲動，與虛擬化。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void RemoveCleanUpVirtualizedItemHandler (System.Windows.DependencyObject element, System.Windows.Controls.CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventHandler handler);

.method public static hidebysig void RemoveCleanUpVirtualizedItemHandler(class System.Windows.DependencyObject element, class System.Windows.Controls.CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventHandler handler) cil managed
Public Shared Sub RemoveCleanUpVirtualizedItemHandler (element As DependencyObject, handler As CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventHandler)

param.name: element
param.span: 要從中移除處理常式的 。

span.span: The from which the handler is being removed.

param.name: handler
param.span: 指定要移除的事件處理常式。

span.span: Specifies the event handler that is to be removed.

summary.span: 移除 附加事件的事件處理常式。

span.span: Removes an event handler for the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準配置系統會建立項目容器，然後計算每個項目的清單控制項相關聯的配置。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. Word 「 虛擬化 」 是指一種技術的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]該項目會產生較大的數字，根據畫面上所顯示的項目項目。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 產生許多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]項目在螢幕上可能只有幾個項目時可能會影響應用程式的效能。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 計算可見的項目數目，並搭配從(例如或) 來建立[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]僅為可見的項目項目。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控制項是，會啟用實體的捲動。If a control is the , physical scrolling is enabled. 如果是，捲動是被子元素的邏輯。If a is the , scrolling is logical by child element.
